ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.X001!DE.dialogue_text: An impenetrable darkness cloaks the chamber, though the lengthy echoes from Ormenos' footfalls hint at its impressive dimensions. The room's sole apparent source of illumination hangs high above a broken circle of onyx humanoid statues, some twenty paces ahead. The circle opens toward Ormenos, revealing a silver throne - currently occupied. Closer inspection reveals a second, lesser source of light: behind the throne an imposing blast furnace breathes fire and spits sparks.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.X0010!D.dialogue_text: Ormenos approaches the carpeted aperture to the circle of statues, noticing that a man of undeniable youth sits upon the silver throne. Reaching the perimeter of the circle he stops and kneels, as instructed.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.X002!DE.dialogue_text: An impenetrable darkness cloaks the chamber, though the lengthy echoes from Ormenos' footfalls hint at its impressive dimensions. The room's sole apparent source of illumination hangs high above a broken circle of onyx humanoid statues, some twenty paces ahead. The circle opens toward Ormenos, revealing a silver throne - currently occupied by the young Thought-Weaver from the Stone Circle, Brother Babel. Closer inspection reveals a second, lesser source of light: behind the throne an imposing blast furnace breathes fire and spits sparks.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.005!DES.dialogue_text: In the grips of ecstasy, Ormenos cackles and its warped echo laughs back at him. The power, the absolute dominance he exhibited over the Prime Archon of the Enclave fills him with destructive delight. It is this strength he needs to protect himself from the horrors that await him in the darkness of imbalance; it is this power that will guard against those evil overlords who seek to rob him of agency...

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0050!DE.dialogue_text: Ormenos feels a tug on his Trueflesh, a cosmic hand peeling a stubborn scab from a half-healed wound. His overwhelming sense of power diminishes as his psyche frays from the strain. Soon it is too great to bear and the skin of his Falseflesh begins to rip apart. All Ormenos can do is laugh at the ruby fountains streaming from his flesh. He laughs a journey from amusement to terror and then on to resentment, stopping finally at resignation; soon the laughs turn to whimpers, and last to silence. The agony so severe, so complete, forces sleep upon the broken mage...

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.007!DES.dialogue_text: Having reached an agreement, Babel summons Ormenos into the inner circle of statues. He points to the copper disk beneath the throne. Ormenos walks upon it. The Prime Archon then calls to mind the Glyph of Nearcasting. The throne as well as the platform upon which it stands begins to glow until both magi dissolve into nothing but pure light...

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.008!DES.dialogue_text: Ormenos' Falseflesh reforms upon a copper platform. He now sits in a throne, greeted by the myriad unmoving eyes of onyx statues. These form a ring around him, some twenty paces wide, and mark the edge of all illumination. The shadows beyond seem to pulse, waiting for the light to weaken, waiting to consume everything with unadulterated absence...

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0080!DE.dialogue_text: Sensing an incredible heat from behind, Ormenos turns his head to see an ominous blast furnace, spitting sparks and breathing fire.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0081!DE.dialogue_text: He jumps from the throne and rushes out of the circle, into the darkness, stumbling upon the invisible, uneven stones that tile the floor. He knows not what this place could be, but intuits it is the Archon's Apse. His inexplicable knowledge of this is almost as disconcerting as the existence of the forbidden chamber itself.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0082!DE.dialogue_text: He trips over a stone, falling hard to his knees; the pain reminds him he is alive... And as long as he lives, he believes hope remains.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0083!DE.dialogue_text: He crawls along the ground, attempting to find the walls of the chamber. Further and further into the void, the light of the circle ever-diminishes as his distance from it grows.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0084!DE.dialogue_text: Yet no walls appear... All sights, all sounds, everything drown in this impenetrable darkness. And soon the light vanishes altogether, leaving the confused mage trembling in fear at the uncertainty of his lot.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0085!DE.dialogue_text: Having been pushed far beyond his limits, Ormenos breaks. His mind stops and with it perception itself.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0086!DE.dialogue_text: Though his Falseflesh yet persists, Ormenos is no more.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.X000!BA.dialogue_text: "Brother Inquisitor, approach and kneel before your predecessors; come pay tribute to their selfless contributions to our Order."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.001!BAB.dialogue_text: "You stand in the presence of the Choir of Archons, the will of our Order and nexus of all wisdom it has accrued.”

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0010!BA.dialogue_text: "And at its center stand I, Marduk of Zemes, the 17th Prime Archon."

A.response_text: "So the Choir of Archons... is just you?"

B.response_text: "Why have you summoned me here?"

D.response_text: "It's rare to see one so young in such a position of power..."
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0014!BABEL!

E.response_text: "I remain unimpressed."
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0015!BABEL!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0011!BA.dialogue_text: "You're blind to the truth before you, Brother - or perhaps willfully ignorant."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00110!B.dialogue_text: "These statues are more than mere onyx: they are crystallized memory with an awareness of their own... they are the fate of all Prime Archons."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00111!B.dialogue_text: "When the next Prime Archon is selected, I will take my place among them. My knowledge becomes ours, and our will becomes mine."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00112!B.dialogue_text: "Indeed, by the laws of our Order, you should replace me immediately - your name added to the codex - and I should submit my Trueflesh to the Sylvan Architect... to the benefit of all."

A.response_text: "'Should'? It sounds as though you have other plans..."

B.response_text: "Why does the Sylvan Architect demand your Trueflesh?"

E.response_text: "Subjugation hardly benefits the subjugated."
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0025!BABEL!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0012!BA.dialogue_text: "I'd expect you to have predicted such a summons when you acquired the Glyph of Nearcasting, Brother Inquisitor..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00120!B.dialogue_text: "Indeed, by the laws of our Order, you should replace me immediately - your name added to the codex - and I should submit my Trueflesh to the Sylvan Architect... to the benefit of all."

A.response_text: "'Should'? It sounds as though you have other plans..."

B.response_text: "Why does the Sylvan Architect demand your Trueflesh?"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0013!BA.dialogue_text: "That's all you have to say? 'I see'?"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00130!B.dialogue_text: "Our Order's greatest secret laid bare before you and you're utterly unmoved?"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00131!B.dialogue_text: "How odd that one as uninquisitive as yourself would be given the moniker 'Inquisitor'..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00132!B.dialogue_text: "Yet the fact remains, you have discovered the knowledge of Nearcasting, as we all did once."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00133!B.dialogue_text: "Thus, by the laws of our Order, you should replace me immediately - your name added to the codex - and I should submit my Trueflesh to the Sylvan Architect... to the benefit of all."

B.response_text: "Why does the Sylvan Architect demand your Trueflesh?"

D.response_text: "Then I‘m... the new Prime Archon?"
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0024!BABEL!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0014!BA.dialogue_text: "The status of Prime Archon is blind to age... No, it relies solely on insight."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00140!B.dialogue_text: "This insight awakens through practice in Discipline and inevitably leads to the Crypt of the Archons."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00141!B.dialogue_text: "Indeed, by the laws of our Order, you should replace me immediately - your name added to the codex - and I should submit my Trueflesh to the Sylvan Architect... to the benefit of all."

D.response_text: "Then I‘m... the new Prime Archon?"
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0024!BABEL!

E.response_text: "Subjugation hardly benefits the subjugated."
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0025!BABEL!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0015!BA.dialogue_text: "And whose goal was it to impress you, Inquisitor?"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00150!B.dialogue_text: "Your arrogance is a luxury afforded only by your ignorance, and your baseless pride grows like mold in its shadow."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00151!B.dialogue_text: "Believe me, the crushing weight of Awareness casts the proudest from their pitiful 'heights'..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00152!B.dialogue_text: "While you may now scale the highest mountains, you will never reach the stars, Brother Inquisitor."

D.response_text: "What 'terrors' do you speak of...?"
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0032!BABEL!

E.response_text: "Your words reek of false bravado, boy."
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00153!BABEL!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00154!B.dialogue_text: "Perhaps one day you'll see behind the curtain... you'll catch a glimpse of the true Masters of the Enclave..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00155!B.dialogue_text: "And when you do, your hair will pale and your Trueflesh shatter."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00156!B.dialogue_text: "But until then, you'll have to remain among the Vault-dwellers, in stasis. I only hope this world awaits you when you awaken."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00160!B.dialogue_text: "My terseness of speech is legendary, even among the greatest orators of our Order!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00161!B.dialogue_text: "I'm a fountain of pithy phrases, brevity incarnate, the very definition of laconic even!"

F.response_text: "Keep yapping; I don't think you've made my point well enough yet..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00210!B.dialogue_text: "Indeed, I plan to postpone fulfillment of the covenant of Archons. You see, I'm the only one in the history of our order to have gone beyond the Crypt of the Archons..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00211!B.dialogue_text: "And I alone know the horrors lurking beyond it."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00212!B.dialogue_text: "As such, my time as Prime Archon cannot end now."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00213!B.dialogue_text: "Who else has seen the origins of our Order? Who else can prevent its catastrophic conclusion?"

B.response_text: "What lies beyond the Crypt?"

E.response_text: "What makes you think you're the chosen one?"
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0035!BABEL!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0022!BA.dialogue_text: "It's uncertain, a mere act of faith in all the previous Prime Archons..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00221!B.dialogue_text: "But it's not yet my time to cast will into the fire of unity."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00222!B.dialogue_text: "No, for I alone have solved the cipher at the Crypt of the Archons; I alone have seen the nightmares that lurk beyond; I alone can prevent our Order's demise!"

B.response_text: "What lies beyond the Crypt?"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0023!BA.dialogue_text: "But you see, Brother Inquisitor, I cannot abdicate this silver throne; for I have unfinished tasks - ones which cannot be entrusted to the uninitiated."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00230!B.dialogue_text: "Thus, you'll have to remain in stasis, among the Vault-Dwellers. But don't despair, it's only until I've accomplished what would be impossible for you to even imagine."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00231!B.dialogue_text: "The Vault will guard you as you await your turn as Archon."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0024!BA.dialogue_text: "Under ordinary circumstances, you'd indeed assume the mantle... However, more pressing matters demand delay."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00240!B.dialogue_text: "You see, I alone have solved the cipher at the Crypt of the Archons; I alone have seen the nightmares lurking beyond; I alone can prevent our Order's demise."

D.response_text: "Then what is to become of me?"
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0034!BABEL!

E.response_text: "Fancy yourself the chosen one, do you?"
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0035!BABEL!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0025!BA.dialogue_text: "Ah, but that's where you're wrong, dearest Brother."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00250!B.dialogue_text: "When the will is unified, conflicts vanish!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00252!B.dialogue_text: "But it's not yet my time to cast will into the fire of unity..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00253!B.dialogue_text: "Oh no, for I alone have solved the cipher at the Crypt of the Archons; I alone have seen the nightmares lurking beyond; I alone can prevent our Order's demise!"

D.response_text: "Then what's to become of me?"
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0034!BABEL!

E.response_text: "You're no chosen one!"
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0035!BABEL!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0026!BA.dialogue_text: "You vile troll! I won't be drawn into a flame war with you!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00260!B.dialogue_text: "No, you're here because of your discovery of Nearcasting!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00261!B.dialogue_text: "And by the laws of our Order, you should replace me and I should submit my Trueflesh to the forge of the Sylvan Architect."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00262!B.dialogue_text: "Such that I may join the Choir and subjugate my Self to its sublime singularity of will."

A.response_text: "'Should'? Sounds like you don't plan on doing that..."

B.response_text: "Why would Vanargand want that?"

D.response_text: "Wait a second! I'm the new Prime Archon!?"
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0024!BABEL!

E.response_text: "Subjugation hardly benefits the subjugated."
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0025!BABEL!

F.response_text: "If brevity is the soul of wit, does that make you soulless or witless?"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0031!BA.dialogue_text: "I appreciate the sentiment, but I'm afraid your helping hand extends in ignorance. Were you to see even the shadows cast by the ancient evil looming over us, your sanity would wither and your ghost'd vacate its very shell..."

B.response_text: "I doubt anything is more frightening than ignorance."

E.response_text: "So you think you're the 'chosen one' then?"
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0035!BABEL!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00310!B.dialogue_text: "About as powerless as a fish seeking to fly, maybe. You are a man of many talents, Brother, but excellence in some is not excellence in all."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00311!B.dialogue_text: "No, Brother, I'm afraid the burden I bear and the actions I take are for the good of our Order. I alone need suffer the terrors of the half-forgotten nightmare; I alone need sacrifice my Trueflesh to end it."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0032!BA.dialogue_text: "Our Order's true, sinister origins and their horripilating instigator, that's what. I warn you, Inquisitor, the answers you seek cannot even through madness be forgotten..."

A.response_text: "I wish to help if I can."

B.response_text: "Nothing can be more terrifying than ignorance."

C.response_text: "Then I choose not to pursue it."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00320!B.dialogue_text: "Spoken like a true Enclavean... Indeed, your courage is admirable."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00321!B.dialogue_text: "Then it seems you leave me no choice. Come with me and the plight of Awareness will be yours. But if you cannot cope, your Falseflesh will be submitted to the Vault for stasis."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00322!B.dialogue_text: "Come, enter the Choir's inner circle and your own eyes will witness horrors beyond measure..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00330!B.dialogue_text: "Oh, and worry not, for you'll take your rightful place as Prime Archon, in due time."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0034!BA.dialogue_text: "You, Brother, will take your rightful place as Prime Archon, in due time."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00340!B.dialogue_text: "However, until either my task is complete or my Falseflesh expired, you must wait in the timeless realms of the Void."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0035!BA.dialogue_text: "I'm chosen by none but circumstances, Brother - and my lot is likely to be a lamb to the slaughter."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00350!B.dialogue_text: "Yet I ask, would you go in my stead?"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00351!B.dialogue_text: "None would, if they knew what ancient depravity knocks at our Order's doors!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00352!B.dialogue_text: "Though I may fail, I know what I must do; and I'd not wish this task even upon my worst enemy."

D.response_text: "Then what's to become of me?"
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0034!BABEL!

E.response_text: "Then go die and be forgotten."
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00353!BABEL!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00353!B.dialogue_text: "Enjoy the fearlessness hubris affords you, Brother; it won't last."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00354!B.dialogue_text: "Just remember my failure spells our Order's doom - unless the next Primer Archon can stop it..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.0036!BA.dialogue_text: "...You are an odious and unsympathetic arse; your very existence makes me doubt the sanctity of our Order's mission!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00361!B.dialogue_text: "The burden of knowledge is great, even for those of relatively humble wisdom, such as you."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00362!B.dialogue_text: "I suppose it's for the best then that you're taken to the Void and laid to rest among the Vault-dwellers..."

F.response_text: "Blah, blah, blah... Where's your off button?"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00363!B.dialogue_text: "...I can't believe an arse like you will succeed me as Prime Archon!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!ARCHONS' APSE!0.00364!B.dialogue_text: "Enough! I've had it! To the Void with you!"

F.response_text: "The Void, huh? Could be gremlin territory. Worth a look!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: MULTICHECKER

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.001.dialogue_text: Ormenos approaches the massive wooden doors leading to the Nave. They stand like two lone trees clinging to an otherwise barren cliffside. Out of place to be sure, but somehow majestic because of their oddity. Etched deep into their collective surface is one lonely symbol - alone because it is all that needs be there - the very symbol of the Enclave. Four alpha omega chimeras stare inward toward a single point, never quite touching at it; four corners suggest a broken square containing them. Shivers sneak their way down his spine - the unwelcome prelude to speaking before the Choir.

The doors begin to fade, breaking the silence not with their own noise but with the din that comes from beyond them, from within the Nave itself. Ormenos enters, walking into a hall much longer than it is wide. Countless unseeing eyes stare down from vaulted ceilings and out from painted walls; here extravagant gilded depictions of familiar Vanquished mythology adorn the six directions. Infamously anything but reserved when it came to their artwork, the Vanquished left behind countless frescoes and mosaics never quite equaled by the bumbling hands that would imitate them after the Great Awakening.

Crystal windows illuminate the hall brighter than noontime on a cloudless day, even despite being in the depths of the earth - a miracle of Vanquished artifice. Their light reflects upon the golden walls, sparkling and crackling, igniting a raging conflagration of pure decadence.

Lining the halls are dozens of red and black marble pillars, so highly polished they conjure up the myriad ghostly reflections of surrounding objects. Between the supports, ornate wooden pews sit in neatly ordered rows with scores of Enclaveans seated upon them. Some come to present their findings on matters of lesser import; others, merely to listen to such reports. For some it is more important to discover; yet for the rest, it is only necessary to remember.

Beyond the benches, a curtained balcony stares down from on high - the mysterious, veiled face of the Choir itself. Beneath it, a narrowing set of stairs lead a half-story below toward an unremarkable wooden door, scarcely tall enough for human use. The door is a focal point for novice gossip and speculation; none know where it leads for certain. But this wonder soon fades as the enigma becomes familiar, and ignorance becomes accepted as a matter of course. Sometimes Ormenos wonders if he is the only Senior member who has not forgotten this hole in their collective knowledge.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: He likewise wonders why none know the identity of the Choir of Archons. He wonders and yet aspires to rise to the rank of Archon anyway - as do all magi of the Order. To reach those heights is the ultimate recognition, the very pinnacle of Discipline.
The crowd near the back parts, making way for Ormenos to proceed. Walking to the opposite end of the hall, he steps upon a small speaking dais to address the Choir as commanded.
MULTICHECKER

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.001.dialogue_text: As the Choir's final words fade in dying echoes, light creeps in from the opening doors at the opposite end of the Nave. Framed by the intruding rays, the silhouette of an imperious figure struts towards the dais. The doors begin to reform, banishing the brilliance beyond and the strong contrast cloaking the figure along with it.

Shadows melt away, revealing the young and impetuous Enforcer known as the Jinn Slayer. Despite his youth and inexperience, he already has a lengthy history of grandiloquence and... spontaneity. Were it not for his clear talents as an Enforcer, he would have likely been cast into the depths of the Vault mere weeks after joining.

Yet here he is, not more than half a year into his tenure among the magi of the Enclave and causing a ruckus that will inevitably end in some sort of disciplinary action - perhaps the last one he ever receives...

B.response_text: Leave before things get ugly

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.001.dialogue_text: Not wishing to stay a moment longer in this crowded cage, Ormenos inches his way towards doors and away from the cluster of overly curious magi. The yoke of subjugation set firmly on his shoulders, Ormenos falls into a dream-like state shifting his feet, as of habit, to the rhythm of the Choir's hypnotic orders...

Relax. Enjoy a well-deserved rest. The commands echo throughout his empty skull. They become a mind-numbing mantra, saving him the trouble of thinking. He knows the meaning, he knows he must amble to his cell, without interruption, without hesitation...
And so he does.

Ormenos steps down from the dais to join the throng, just enough to be forgotten. The Jinn Slayer is quick to replace him, ignoring the protests of the magi in line to speak. Once upon the platform, his back to the crowd, he raises a hand fingers outstretched. The loud, angry grunts and speculative muttering persists. One finger curls inward. The noise fades to a dull roar. A second finger curls, seeming to drain the very sound from the air. Before the third finger fully curls, a graveyard silence haunts the Nave. The Enforcer caste has been a gathering storm making lots of waves in the last few months, all centered around this man, and none wish to be out at sea when the storm strikes.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: The Jinn Slayer lowers his hand catching it with the other behind his back. His own tense silence tightens invisible bonds around all present; now, none dare move, much less speak. The stage is prepared.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.001.dialogue_text: The silence breaks. Angry words, emotion-filled to bursting, words unbecoming of magi bicker and bemoan. Though some semblance of order remains, the seeds of chaos are sown.

The Jinn Slayer's discovery revealed and the Choir's sentence given, Enforcers quickly escort the rebel from the Nave. The condemned does not resist; not one sign of displeasure marks his face. No, the smirk cracking his granite features belongs not to a man condemned, but to a man vindicated, to a man who knows he has won.

But Ormenos cannot quite anticipate where all this will lead. Nor does he feel the need to. For now, he simply wishes to obey those commands the Choir gave. For now, he just wants to... what was he supposed to do again? The memory seems to rest just outside consciousness, a malformed and unreadable mess, present but impossible to decipher. For now, then, all he can do is leave the Nave.

As the Choir's final words fade in dying echoes, light creeps in from the opening doors at the opposite end of the Nave. Framed by the intruding rays, the silhouette of an imperious figure struts towards the dais. The doors begin to reform, banishing the brilliance beyond and the strong contrast cloaking the figure along with it.

Shadows melt away, revealing the young and impetuous Enforcer known as the Jinn Slayer. Despite his youth and inexperience, he already has a lengthy history of grandiloquence and... spontaneity. Were it not for his clear talents as an Enforcer, he would have likely been cast into the depths of the Vault mere weeks after joining.

Yet here he is, not more than half a year into his tenure among the magi of the Enclave and causing a ruckus that will inevitably end in some sort of disciplinary action - perhaps the last one he ever receives...

B.response_text: Leave before things get ugly

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: Ormenos steps down from the dais ready to quietly withdraw. Yet, before he can he can disappear into the crowd, a hooded Sister tightly grips his shoulder from behind and whispers into his ear...

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.001.dialogue_text: The hooded figure turns and begins to walk away, stopping only when noticing that Ormenos has not followed. She looks back over her shoulder and signals the Inquisitor to follow...
And like a well-trained pup, he follows.

Ormenos steps down from the dais to join the throng, just enough to be forgotten. The Jinn Slayer is quick to replace him, ignoring the protests of the magi in line to speak. Once upon the platform, his back to the crowd, he raises a hand fingers outstretched. The loud, angry grunts and speculative muttering persists. One finger curls inward. The noise fades to a dull roar. A second finger curls, seeming to drain the very sound from the air. Before the third finger fully curls, a graveyard silence haunts the Nave. The Enforcer caste has been a gathering storm making lots of waves in the last few months, all centered around this man, and none wish to be out at sea when the storm strikes.

The Jinn Slayer lowers his hand catching it with the other behind his back. His own tense silence tightens invisible bonds around all present; now, none dare move, much less speak. The stage is prepared.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: However, before the spectacle can begin, a hooded Enclavean Sister of uncertain identity taps Ormenos on the shoulder and whispers into his ear.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.001.dialogue_text: Enforcers surround Ormenos, preparing for resistance. As the trapped mage considers what to do, the doors contract, revealing the young and impetuous Enforcer known as the Jinn Slayer framed by the radiance of the outer hallway. He arrives unannounced, unexpected, demanding an audience with the Choir... An audience Ormenos will not witness, as he feels a sharp pain steal his consciousness, witnessing one last...

Enforcers surround Ormenos, preparing for resistance. As the trapped mage considers what to do, the doors contract, revealing the young and impetuous Enforcer known as the Jinn Slayer framed by the radiance of the outer hallway. He arrives unannounced, unexpected, demanding an audience with the Choir... An audience Ormenos will not witness, as he feels a sharp pain steal his consciousness, witnessing one last...

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.002.dialogue_text: Ormenos approaches the massive wooden doors leading to the Nave. They stand like two lone trees clinging to an otherwise barren cliffside. Out of place to be sure, but somehow majestic because of their oddity. Etched deep into their collective surface is one lonely symbol - alone because it is all that needs be there - the very symbol of the Enclave. Four alpha omega chimeras stare inward toward a single point, never quite touching at it; four corners suggest a broken square containing them. Shivers sneak their way down his spine - the unwelcome prelude to speaking before the Choir.

The doors begin to fade, breaking the silence not with their own noise but with the din that comes from beyond them, from within the Nave itself. Ormenos enters, walking into a hall much longer than it is wide. Countless unseeing eyes stare down from vaulted ceilings and out from painted walls; here extravagant gilded depictions of familiar Vanquished mythology adorn the six directions. Infamously anything but reserved when it came to their artwork, the Vanquished left behind countless frescoes and mosaics never quite equaled by the bumbling hands that would imitate them after the Great Awakening.

Crystal windows illuminate the hall brighter than noontime on a cloudless day, even despite being in the depths of the earth - a miracle of Vanquished artifice. Their light reflects upon the golden walls, sparkling and crackling, igniting a raging conflagration of pure decadence.

Lining the halls are dozens of red and black marble pillars, so highly polished they conjure up the myriad ghostly reflections of surrounding objects. Between the supports, ornate wooden pews sit in neatly ordered rows with scores of Enclaveans seated upon them. Some come to present their findings on matters of lesser import; others, merely to listen to such reports. For some it is more important to discover; yet for the rest, it is only necessary to remember.

Beyond the benches, a curtained balcony stares down from on high - the mysterious, veiled face of the Choir itself. Beneath it, a narrowing set of stairs lead a half-story below toward an unremarkable wooden door, scarcely tall enough for human use. The door is a focal point for novice gossip and speculation; none know where it leads for certain. But this wonder soon fades as the enigma becomes familiar, and ignorance becomes accepted as a matter of course. Sometimes Ormenos wonders if he is the only Senior member who has not forgotten this hole in their collective knowledge.

He likewise wonders why none know the identity of the Choir of Archons. He wonders and yet aspires to rise to the rank of Archon anyway - as do all magi of the Order. To reach those heights is the ultimate recognition, the very pinnacle of Discipline...

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: But soon his mind gravitates toward his recent wanderings around the Enclave, a transgression likely most displeasing to the Choir. The very thought of punishment sends him into a momentary fit of shudders and a violent cold sweat.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.003.dialogue_text: Ormenos seems to awaken from his waking slumber, finding his Enforcer escort has brought him to Judgment's doorstep. One prods Ormenos from behind, forcing him to clumsily renew his stride toward the massive wooden doors of the Nave. They stand like two lone trees clinging to an otherwise barren cliffside. Out of place to be sure, but somehow majestic because of their oddity. Etched deep into their collective surface is one lonely symbol - alone because it is all that needs be there - the very symbol of the Enclave. Four alpha omega chimeras stare inward toward a single point, never quite touching at it; four corners suggest a broken square containing them. Shivers sneak their way down his spine - the unwelcome prelude to speaking before the Choir.

The doors begin to fade, breaking the silence not with their own noise but with the din that comes from beyond them, from within the Nave itself. Several Enforcers enter first, leaving only two behind to encourage Ormenos to proceed. Habit carries him unwittingly toward what reason fears the most. The hall is strange in its familiarity. It is much longer than it is wide, with countless unseeing eyes staring down from vaulted ceilings and out from painted walls; here extravagant gilded depictions of Vanquished mythology adorn the six directions.

Crystal windows illuminate the hall brighter than noontime on a cloudless day, even despite being in the depths of the earth - a miracle of Vanquished artifice. Their light reflects upon the golden walls, sparkling and crackling, igniting a raging conflagration of pure decadence.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: Lining the halls are dozens of red and black marble pillars, so highly polished they conjure up the myriad ghostly reflections of surrounding objects. Between the supports, ornate wooden pews sit in neatly ordered rows with scores of Enclaveans seated upon them. They all stare and whisper their derisive predictions. Not a single ally slithers among them.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.003.dialogue_text: The crowd of squawking magi parts, making way for Ormenos. Yet he hesitates, knowing that what awaits him even after compliance is at best an indefinite time spent in solitary confinement.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: As Ormenos begins his plea for clemency, his escort of Enforcers renew their grips and drag the recalcitrant mage up to the front, where they stand him upon a minuscule dais.
Ormenos walks dutifully to the opposite end of the hall and steps upon a minuscule speaking dais, ready to address the Choir of Archons.

Ormenos stands looking quizzically about at his frowning and appalled colleagues. It is not long before his escort of Enforcers renew their grips and drag the recalcitrant mage up to the front, where they stand him upon a minuscule dais.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.003.dialogue_text: Ormenos takes flight, rushing toward the door whence he entered the hall, bumping into his escort of Enforcers. Like an arrow hitting a brick wall, he is cast mercilessly upon the ground. Panicked, terrified, and crazed, Ormenos flails about trying to break himself free of those who seek to restrain him.\n\n        Suddenly, success! They release their hold, preferring instead a swift blow to the nape of his neck, subsequently sending him careening into the adumbral world of dreams...

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: Ormenos stands brazenly against the shadowy Choir, unflinching, unmoving, ready to fight to his last breath. To his dismay, he need not wait long, as the Enforcers who had brought him here renew their grips and cast him mercilessly upon the ground.

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.003.dialogue_text: Angered, humiliated, and crazed, Ormenos wrestles against his amused captors, desperately trying to break free.
Suddenly, success! They release their hold, preferring instead a swift blow to the nape of his neck, subsequently sending him careening into the adumbral world of dreams...

Embracing the absurdity of it all, Ormenos squawks toward the shadowy Choir, producing a cry that would bring tears to even the most stone-faced poultry's eyes. Then, in a brilliant spectacle beyond all description - including this one - the Heavens split in twain revealing yet another shadowy figure...
Thus appears that majestic god of fowl, the feathered king, the patron saint of pillow stuffing, Roostor!

Swooping down from his airy sea of clouds, He enacts divine retribution upon this den of iniquity, obliterating the retinue of vile gremlins within. He shows no mercy to those who would disgrace his faithful followers.

Like a barnyard cyclone, the Feathered One claws, pecks and slaps the ghosts from all His scion's would-be assailants. Large gashes now tattoo the vacant Falsefleshes of the lot, and but a scant few have eyes left to see Him snuff the life-fire from their bodies.

The carnage complete, the havoc wrought, hallowed Roostor, with a powerful flap from His almighty wings, rockets Himself skyward toward the infinity of belief! The resultant gust of wind casts Ormenos backwards toward a marbled pillar. The initial shock sends him rebounding into several other pillars and gilded walls, all lighting up upon impact.

The final meeting of a wall with his face brings upon a bout of unexpected sleep. Yet right as Ormenos' eyelids succumb to the weight of exhaustion, he spies his savior lounging on a fluffy cloud. Roostor looks back with a sparkling smile, issuing one final, reassuring wink...

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: The intensity with which the Choir spoke weighs heavy upon Ormenos' mind, for there is only one logical conclusion he can draw from his current circumstances - a most unpleasant one. With this thought fresh in his mind, exhaustion cuts consciousness from its thread-thin tether; it turns eyelids to lead blocks; it turns muscles to jelly; it...
MULTICHECKER

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "We will only ask once more - and delay no longer, or the consequences will be severe!"

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000363!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "What is it you have found among the memories of Torma?"

A.response_text: "I'm sorry, I meant to say I learned of Kabu and the Thought Wheel..."
A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00011!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

B.response_text: "I saw many things; the stress must have gotten to me. What do you wish to hear?"
B.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00012!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

C.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00013!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

D.response_text: "Forgive me, esteemed Choir! I recall seeing a Seer from Jer."
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00014!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

E.response_text: "I'm... Okay. Look, she is a fanatic, a slave to the Biracul."
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00015!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

F.response_text: "Well, other than the innuendo I just made, nothing interesting."
F.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00046!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Then, you will be sent to the Vault - subject to the same methods you have subjected others to."

F.response_text: "You're sending me on vacation?! How kind! Though I really do deserve it..."
F.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00096!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "This will be the crowning achievement of our Order."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000910!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Brother, your contribution to our cause is significant, and as such, you may now relax and enjoy a well-deserved rest."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.0009100!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Brother Entropy Stayer is already positioned in Kabu; he will handle the case henceforth."

A.response_text: "Brother Entropy Stayer is... a fine replacement."
A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000911!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

B.response_text: "Your choice is logical - his talents and position are ideal for this."
B.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000911!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

C.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000911!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

D.response_text: "Kambesh? But I was the one who found it! Only I truly understand!"
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9990.X2020!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

E.response_text: "Clearly I'm the superior choice. Kambesh is nothing."
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9990.X2020!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

F.response_text: "Oh! That's the guy that gets killed by Khaa and Pakahron!"
F.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000916!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "You will have no further contact with the Wayfarer's mind. Preparations for her disposal are forthcoming."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.0009110!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Her interrogation has been the most protracted one we have seen, and the Mind-Loom has soured her sanity..."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X0009111!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

action: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!10.X000!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!
ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: "Her destruction will be our final mercy to her."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9999.X9999!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Brother Inquisitor, your opinion was neither requested nor desired."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.0009140!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Not only have you spoken the unspeakable name of a beloved Brother, but worse, you have called to question the Choir's authority."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.0009141!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Do as commanded, for the good of the Order, or there will be consequences."

D.response_text: "Yes, of course. Forgive my impertinence..."
D.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.0009144!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

E.response_text: "Oppose me and there will be consequences!"
E.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.0009145!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "You have returned from chaos to order, from Ignorance to Discipline. Good."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00091440!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "But our memory is longer than the Muninn's. That you had strayed at all shall be marked on your permanent record."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00091441!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Now, return to your quarters."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000911!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "A frog in a well, unaware of the sea beyond the limits of your imagination..."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00091450!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "You have no idea how small and insignificant you are, Inquisitor."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00091451!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "But you will learn soon enough."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00095!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "...Is this a threat upon your Brother's life, Inquisitor?"

F.response_text: "No, look, I'm a time-traveler and spoiler alert... he dies!"
F.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.0009160!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Stop with this nonsense at once, or there will be consequences."

F.response_text: "If you'd read the other book, you'd know!"
F.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.00046!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "No, Inquisitor, it is not as we wish, but as your actions demand."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000930!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Enforcers! Take this fallen Brother to the Vault."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9990.X2072!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "For time and isolation have a way of changing minds."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000950!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Will repentance come before your Trueflesh falls to the curse of madness?"

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9990.X2072!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Enforcers, remove the fallen Brother."

F.response_text: "That's it! I'm summoning Roostor, your gremlin bastards!"
F.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9990.X2071!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!1.000.dialogue_text: "Brother Inquisitor, your tardiness is inexcusable. One demerit will be marked on your permanent record."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!1.X0001!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

action: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.0001!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!
ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!1.X00.dialogue_text: "Now, come report your findings from recent excursions. To the front, immediately. All others, stand aside."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9999.X9999!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!2.000.dialogue_text: "Inquisitor, your utter neglect of duty and flagrant disregard for the Order is inexcusable."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!2.0001!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!2.000.dialogue_text: "You are to atone in Dissent's Remorse indefinitely upon completion of this report."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!2.X0002!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

action: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.0001!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!
ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!2.X00.dialogue_text: "Now, come to the front immediately. All others, stand aside."

action: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!10.X001!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!
ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!10.X0.dialogue_text: "Brother Jinn Slayer, your words are disruptive and uncompelling. Cease immediately."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9999.X1202!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

action: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!10.X002!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!
ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!10.X0.dialogue_text: "Illogical. Long has it been known and verified that the Sylvan Architect is but a myth."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9999.X1202!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

action: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!10.003!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!
ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!10.X0.dialogue_text: "Enough. Enforcers. Remove the cancer before it causes more damage."

A.dest_add: ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9999.X1202!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!
ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!10.004!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!
ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!10.005!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!
ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!9999.X1202!CHOIR OF ARCHONS!

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: "Brothers and Sisters of the Enclave! The Choir of Archons has hidden from us the true nature of our Order for far too long!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.001.dialogue_text: "I will not cease! I will never cease!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.002.dialogue_text: "My words are the light of Awareness come to banish the shadows your deceit casts!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.003.dialogue_text: "Brothers and Sisters, we have been manipulated... by none other than the Sylvan Architect himself!"
"But 'how?' you will surely wish to hear..."

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: "Suffice it to say that skulking curs who hide behind curtains hide for a reason!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.004.dialogue_text: "Oh, the Choir sings an old tune, one misremembered through cycles of guided ignorance!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.005.dialogue_text: "But, I have found the records among the sanctuary of Muninn rings, for those white giants' memories neither wane nor disappear! Those memories are unassailable! Immune to the Choir's diseased intent!"
"Brothers! Sisters! I have found the earliest memories of our origins! I have discovered the true purpose of the Stone Circle at the Threshold!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: "Knowledge is power; and the power we now wield will end this forgotten war and free the Order from its invisible bonds!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.006.dialogue_text: "Your pathetic attempts to veil truth end today!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.007.dialogue_text: "Brothers and Sisters, look and see! The cruelty with which the Choir treats the Order is clear evidence of their true allegiance!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.X00.dialogue_text: "We Enforcers have seen firsthand the fates of many a Brother and Sister sinisterly twisted as the Choir tried to silence their curiosity!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.009.dialogue_text: "And now I join the fallen! Fallen, shoved by the Choir into the Void oblivion, forced down into the depths of the Vaults!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.010.dialogue_text: "Fallen, but not kneeling to the Masters, nor to their lackeys! No! Never!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.011.dialogue_text: "May this serve to rouse you from your sleep of complacency!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.012.dialogue_text: "Be not as the draug led by loathsome Jinnwraiths!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.014.dialogue_text: "For the good of the Order! And for the future of Humanity!"

ENCLAVE!THE NAVE!HALL OF RECKONING!0.000.dialogue_text: "Brother Inquisitor, the Choir of Archons summon you to the Apse."
